meanings.definition: The quality or state of being fatty.
meanings.sent1: The fattiness of the bacon made it delicious.
meanings.sent2: I could taste the fattiness of the steak in every bite.
meanings.sent3: The cake's fattiness was so high, it almost seemed like a butter sculpture.
meanings.sent4: The fattiness of the avocado spread across the toast like a rich blanket.
meanings.sent5: The fattiness of the gravy coated the mashed potatoes like a velvety sauce.

meanings.definition: The amount of fat in something.
meanings.sent1: The fattiness of the milk was evident in its creamy texture.
meanings.sent2: She checked the fattiness of the meat before cooking it.
meanings.sent3: The fattiness of the cheese was so high, it looked like a fat mountain.
meanings.sent4: The fattiness of the soup floated on the surface like an oily film.
meanings.sent5: The fattiness of the nuts added a rich flavor to the salad.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of containing a high proportion of fat.
meanings.sent1: The fattiness of the dessert made it a decadent treat.
meanings.sent2: The chef adjusted the fattiness of the sauce to enhance the dish.
meanings.sent3: The fattiness of the ice cream was so high, it felt like eating frozen butter.
meanings.sent4: The fattiness of the pork belly melted in the mouth like butter.
meanings.sent5: The fattiness of the chips left a greasy residue on my fingers.
